body.description: Firmer skin is within reach with the NIVEA Skin Firming Hydration Body Lotion with Q10 and Shea Butter. The formula in this body lotion delivers intense moisture while also firming the skin in as little as 2 weeks with regular use. The lightweight formula is also enriched with CoQ10 and Shea Butter. This NIVEA skin firming lotion is a great option for those looking for a daily body lotion. NIVEA is proud to be one of the leading companies in the field of skin care products, with more than 130 years of experience. Daily body lotion is a key part of a skincare routine. To use, pump lotion and smooth NIVEA Skin Firming Hydration Body Lotion over body, apply twice daily for best results. Firmer, softer skin is waiting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Many lotions give me a terrible rash. The only ingredient in common I've found in the lotions that give me a rash is mineral oil. It seems I might have an allergy. There are an awful lot of lotions that contain mineral oil and I always have to read labels before using a new lotion.I've tried lotions from the lotion specialty stores, and while they smell nice, they really don't seem to moisturize very well. I'd rather buy a quality lotion that moisturizes my skin and doesn't smell like perfume and get my scent from a scent product.I've come to only use this Nivea lotion. The firming doesn't contain mineral oil, though the regular lotion does. Is this lotion a magic skin firming potion? No. But I've been using it quite a while and I do think my skin it holding up pretty well for my age. It moisturizes well and that is what lotion is supposed to do. The moisturizing will help keep my skin firm. I am sticking with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Skin You are In
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs directly into the skin
reviews.reviewText: I have always loved this product.It has become so difficult to find. This lotion firms your skin in a couple of weeks and is not greasy! It also does not compete with any fragrance or perfume you are wearing. I will continue to purchase this again and again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute Best Lotion, Been Using it 20+ Years
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this lotion daily for more than 20 years now (yes, I'm old). I've yet to find anything, even at far higher price points, that works as well. This absorbs quickly and keeps my legs, which I shave daily, smooth and silky, without bumps, redness or itching. All of which are a problem with every single other body lotion I try, but not if I use this Nivea once a day. I've done the oh-so-great-smelling Bum Bum Cream, organic lines at 5x the price that others rave about and, every single time, I come back to this Nivea Firming. Reasonably priced, works fantastic and probably the beauty/skincare product I've been loyal to the longest.Does it firm? Eh, not really. I mean, well hydrated and cared for skin is going to look somewhat firmer by definition, but this isn't going to make cellulite vanish—mostly because that's not a thing any lotion can do.If you said I could have one dessert island beauty product, this drugstore lotion would seriously probably be the one. Yes, it's that good. Not fancy, but absolutely gets the job done, better than anything else I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great results, great smell, but leaves skin a little sticky
reviews.reviewText: This stuff has really surprising results. My skin is noticeably softer and firmer after only a few days of use. My face is brighter, my hands are softer, and my cottage cheesiness is firmer.I have lost quite a bit of weight (50 pounds and counting) so my skin needs some tightening and toning - this stuff does just that. I also have extremely dry skin in the winter over my whole body and this helps with that as well.I use the “stronger” version of this lotion, the gel-cream (on the left in the picture), for my stomach, thighs, and butt. I then use the lotion (on the right) for my chest, arms, hands, and face/neck.It also smells great, not too strong but still a delightful smell. My only complaint, and reason for taking off one star, is that it does leave my skin sticky for an hour or so after application. Other reviewers didn’t seem to have that problem so I’m not sure why I do - I usually apply shortly after showering so I know my skin is clean, but still leaves it sticky. Even so, I would still recommend cuz the results are well worth it. P.S. the gel-cream does not leave any stickiness, it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You get a lot for your money with this, I love this Nivea lotion. It’s not sticky, dries quick & leaves skin soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I use this product my crepey skin dissappeared all day long.I'm 71 so I'm old and I have tried everything this last decade and here it is!Wish I started using it when I was younger.Plus you get three and it's not a fancy high dollar big expectation product only this product works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm now a customer for life.
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit, I was skeptical.I was reading helpful reviews swearing to miracles perfomed by this product, but I was also scratching my head and wondering if a product like this can possibly make that big of a difference.After all, the price is modest for what its function is and what it promises, right?at least that's how I felt, but low and behold those folks praising the product were right.I found that out, upon taking a leap of faith, buying it and being constant using it.now, did it just rejuvinate my skin within 2 applications? absolutely not, if that's the type of prodigy you're seeking, you need the knife of the surgeon ;however, this morning, after CONSTANTLY using this for 3 months on my knees, I found out the pleasant surprise at shower time:my knees wringles were gone.Which is really what prompted me to take better care of myself by hydrating and lotioning up more.I'm not old, but my knees started to look and feel old, their skin was lose and it felt lose and it looked horrible.Who likes to have the knees of a 60 yr old?so ..well I decided to use this product and add it up to my endurance in usage, and now my skin is so much tighter, it looks amazing, it feels amazing , it's radiating, and I get a ton of compliments on how youthful I look and ...like a lot of people speak in utah... " how pretty my skin is"it was worth the money, and as a matter of fact, I did purchase it again and I will keep purchasing this anytime I run out.I'm now a customer for life.

reviews.reviewTitle: It makes your skin feel smooth
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product! It helps rejuvenate dry skin
Buena hidratacion y si mejora la firmeza de la piel :)
Nivea is Nivea and no one can make one like this
Me encanta, me deja suave y firme
